citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:24 pm to 12:54
pm on 14 April 2021. No response received within 30 minutes to a voicemail left at the listed number and multiple honks
from the driveway. Spoke to a family member who said the licensee was out and did not know when they would return.
Additional Inspectors:
KATHRYN CAMPITELLI, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER
Kendra Nicholas, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:24 pm to 12:54 
pm on 14 April 2021. No response received within 30 minutes to a voicemail left at the listed number and multiple honks 
from the driveway. Spoke to a family member who said the licensee was out and did not know when they would return. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KATHRYN CAMPITELLI, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER 
Kendra Nicholas, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
